prerequisite.name: PostgreSQL Database Version
prerequisite.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (current_setting('server_version_num'))::integer >= 90500 THEN true ELSE false END;
prerequisite.message: This package must be installed against PostgreSQL Database Version 9.5 or later.

prerequisite.name: xTuple ERP version
prerequisite.query: WITH version AS ( SELECT (SELECT substring(fetchMetricText('ServerVersion'),E'^([[:digit:]]+)\..*'))::integer as major_version, (SELECT substring(fetchMetricText('ServerVersion'),E'^[[:digit:]]+\.([[:digit:]]+)\..*$'))::integer as minor_version, (SELECT substring(fetchMetricText('ServerVersion'),E'^[[:digit:]]+\.[[:digit:]]+\.([[:digit:]]+)'))::integer as patch_version ) SELECT (major_version = 4 AND minor_version = 11 AND patch_version >= 3) OR (major_version = 4 AND minor_version > 11) OR (major_version > 4) FROM version;
prerequisite.message: This package must be installed against xTuple ERP version 4.11.3 or later. This package has only been tested against version 4.11.3 and may not work in later version without updating.

prerequisite.name: Muse Systems xTuple Utilities
prerequisite.query: WITH version AS ( SELECT (SELECT substring(pkghead_version,E'^([[:digit:]]+)\..*'))::integer as major_version, (SELECT substring(pkghead_version,E'^[[:digit:]]+\.([[:digit:]]+)\..*$'))::integer as minor_version, (SELECT substring(pkghead_version,E'^[[:digit:]]+\.[[:digit:]]+\.([[:digit:]]+)'))::integer as patch_version FROM pkghead WHERE pkghead_name = 'musextputils' ) SELECT (major_version = 6 AND minor_version = 1 AND patch_version >= 0) OR (major_version = 6 AND minor_version > 1) OR (major_version > 6) FROM version;
prerequisite.message: This package requires that the Muse Systems xTuple Utilities version 6.1.0 or any higher version 6 series is installed prior to installation of this package.
